descriptions.name: Kintsugi Bowl
descriptions.description: All that is gold does not glitter, not all those who wander are lost. A lesson in putting yourself back together.

descriptions.name: Obsidian Bowl
descriptions.description: This bowl is made of shimmering stone, black as the night sky. Sometimes called 'dragon glass,' the edges are sharp.

descriptions.name: Purpleheart Bowl
descriptions.description: From the Amaranth region, this bowl flashes with purple and pink, depending on the light. Feel the love!

descriptions.name: Terracotta Bowl
descriptions.description: The most basic of bowls, yet still a deep, satisfying color. Part of you wants to smash it...

descriptions.name: Turquoise Bowl
descriptions.description: You feel a strong connection to the earth when you hold this bowl. We all return to our roots.

descriptions.name: Master Bowl
descriptions.description: The combination of colors strikes you as strange, but when you wear this bowl, you feel a huge sense of power!
